DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety , pharmacokinetics ( PK ) , pharmacodynamics ( PD ) , efficacy ACP-196 ACP 319 B-cell malignancy .

Exclusion Criteria A lifethreatening illness , medical condition organ system dysfunction , investigator 's opinion , could compromise subject 's safety , interfere absorption metabolism study drug , put study outcome undue risk . Central nervous system ( CNS ) involvement lymphoma/leukemia Any therapeutic antibody within 4 week first dose study drug . The time last dose recent chemotherapy experimental therapy first dose study drug < 5 time halflife previously administer agent ( ) . ANC < 0.5 x 10^9/L platelet count < 50 x 10^9/L unless due disease involvement bone marrow . Creatinine > 1.5 x institutional upper limit normal ( ULN ) ; total bilirubin > 1.5 x ULN ( unless due Gilbert 's disease ) ; aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) > 3.0 x ULN .
